roles.title: Minister of Minerals and Energy
quotes: Recently, she was named the Minister of Minerals and Energy, further cementing her influence in shaping Africa’s economic and energy policies.

roles.title: Minister of Investment, Trade, and Industry
quotes: As Botswana’s former Minister of Investment, Trade, and Industry, Kenewendo implemented transformative reforms that significantly improved the ease of doing business, expanded access to domestic and international markets, and positioned Botswana as a competitive player in global value chains and the digital economy.
